Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player in the AviBS project
    Author:
    Avi, Susan

      Player()
      No-arg constructor for a new player
      Player(java.lang.String name, boolean type)
      Constructs a new player with a given name that is either a Bot or a Human.

        public Player()

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              boolean type)
        Constructs a new player with a given name that is either a Bot or a Human. Also initializes the player's current hand
        Parameters:
        name - the player's name
        type - whether it's a human or a bot
